translations: [法]辩论；讨论（debate 的三单形式）

phrs.translation: 广泛的讨论；长时间的讨论

sentences.sentence: His vacuity was a handicap in these debates.
sentences.translation: 思想贫乏是他在这些辩论中的一个弱点。

sentences.sentence: The four debates will be compressed into an eight-day period.
In this new book, Harrison brilliantly disentangles complex debates.
sentences.translation: 在这本新书里，哈里森出色地在复杂的争论中理顺了头绪。
